fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Each day preceding a Full Moon, force a player to dance as your puppet.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Dancing players will be forced to use all of their night abilities on themselves a single time. They can only choose the order, or allow RNG to decide for them.
- Dancing will bypass other rules about what an ability is allowed to target. I.E. if an ability normally can't self-target, and/or requires a specific number of players, it'll be able to self-target anyways.
- Self-targeting as a result of Dancing is considered to be a visit, meaning players will attack themselves if they use abilities that would normally target their own visitors.
- During the PMCS, you will deal an Unstoppable Attack to your target at the end of the night.
